name: MEWFormMail
short_description: MEWFormMail is a cgi perl script, for mailing forms from a webpage, and depositing the form data into a database accessible via thet PERL DBI. It also has features that are ANTI-SPAM...ways to prevent spammers from harvesting your email addresses from yo
